To create a zebra-striped table, use the
nth-child()
selector and add a background-color to all even (or odd) table rows:
Example
tr:nth-child(even) {
background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

Go to our
CSS Tables Tutorial
to learn more about how to style tables.
Go to our
CSS Selector Reference
to learn more about the nth-child() selector.
